briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate Further Therapeutic Strategies With Guselkumab in Participants With Moderate-to-Severe Plaque-Type Psoriasis
officialTitle: A Phase 3b, Randomized, Double-blind, Parallel Group, Multicenter Study to Evaluate Further Therapeutic Strategies With Guselkumab in Patients With Moderate-to-Severe Plaque-Type Psoriasis

arms.label: Part 2: Guselkumab q8w and Guselkumab q16w

summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate that Super-Responders (SRe; defined as psoriasis participants who receive on-label guselkumab treatment until week 20 and respond with a Psoriasis Area and Severity Index score (PASI) = 0 at weeks 20 and 28) maintain control of disease until week 68 with prolonged treatment intervals of 16 weeks (guselkumab 100 mg every 16 weeks).

primaryOutcome.measure: Group 2a and Group 2b: Percentage of Participants Who Achieved an Absolute Psoriasis Area and Severity Index (PASI) Score Less Than (<) 3 at Week 68
